text: The 2012 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards were held on July 14, 2012, at the Mahaka Square in Kelapa Gading, North Jakarta and hosted by Gading Marten, Tarra Budiman, and Nikita Willy. List nominations of 2012 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2012-07-06 The ceremony awards held the theme for "Planet Slime". Agnes Monica received the "Big Inspiration" award for her contributions and her inspiring music career. Agnes Monica get Big Inspiration award from 2012 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2012-07-14 Cherrybelle was the biggest winner of the night, taking home two awards for Favorite Girlband and Slime Star. ==Winners and nominees== Winners are listed on bold List the winners of 2012 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2012-07-16 {| class=wikitable style="width="100%" |- !Favorite Singer !Favorite Band |- | valign="top" | * Budi Doremi ** Afgan ** Agnes Monica ** Ayu Ting Ting | valign="top" | * Vierratale ** Armada ** Ungu ** Wali |- !Favorite Actor/Actress !Favorite Cartoon |- | valign="top" | * Nikita Willy ** Rezky Aditya ** Teuku Wisnu ** Dude Herlino | valign="top" | * SpongeBob SquarePants ** Doraemon ** Naruto ** Shaun the Sheep |- !Favorite Athlete !Favorite Comedian |- | valign="top" | * Taufik Hidayat ** Andik Vermansyah ** Bambang Pamungkas ** Cristian Gonzáles | valign="top" | * Sule ** Olga Syahputra ** Andre Taulany ** Aziz Gagap |- !Favorite Boyband !Favorite Girlband |- | valign="top" | * Coboy Junior ** Dragon Boyz ** SM*SH ** XO-IX | valign="top" | * Cherrybelle ** 7icons ** Blink ** Super Girlies |- !Favorite Child Star !Slime Star |- | valign="top"| * Cinta Kuya ** Umay Shahab ** Nizam ** Baim | valign="top"| * Cherrybelle |- !colspan= "2" | Big Inspiration |- | valign="top" colspan= "2" | * Agnes Monica |- |} ==References== Category:2012 film awards Category:2012 television awards Category:2012 music awards Category:2012 in Indonesian television
title: 2012 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards
